name: 4x4 ATV Racing Champion Hill
description:
4x4 ATV Racing Champion Hill is amazing quad bike racing game on adventurous dirt tracks! Join the ultimate offroad racing adventures as you compete with other crazy ATV bike drivers for the 4x4 offroad racing championship! Be the most intense and quickest offroad rider by driving quad bike in fast racing action on dangerous tracks. If you like ATV quad bike racing simulator games then test your real off-road drifting skills and challenge your friends by achieving best scores. The reality of off-road speed racing with extremely high quality graphics with beautiful surrounding graphical environments. Enjoy the amazing advanced real physics and fast-paced gameplay in this high speed off-road Quad Bike racing adventurous game.
Features:
- Best high speed offroad Quad racing adventurous game
- High quality 3D beautiful stunning graphics
- Excellent realistic 3D environment
- Extremely fast and addictive gameplay
- The most realistic 3D quad bike driving experience
- Amazing Movie Quality sound effects and sound track
- Amazing and realistic controls.
